name: Two Swords (Kavi)
description:
This game was made for GMTK Game-Jam 2021, under the theme "Joined Together", in 48 hours.

Through the game, the player is searching for two swords which are consisted of two key elements, Water & Fire. Without these two swords the Player wouldn't be able to complete his quest and defeat the challenges that are waiting for him to come.

However, due to the poor Internet Service in my country I failed to complete submission during the Jam deadline even though began uploading 1 hour prior to the deadline. So this is no longer a submission for GMTK Game-Jam but a game made in 48 hours under the theme, "Joined Together".
